After making a quick check of the past few post dates, I just made a stunning realization (and one that makes me look rather bad).

In the past 48 hours, there have been almost as many new posts to digivation as there have been in the past two months.

Man. I suck at life.

Guess having a new writing cohort is doing wonders!
